articles.title: Himachal Pradesh: 22 dead in flash floods, landslides
articles.description: As many as 22 people have died in flash floods and landslides in the state of Himachal Pradesh. At least 743 roads have been blocked due to unprecedented rainfall.
articles.content: Twenty two people, including eight members of a family, were killed and six feared dead in incidents of landslide and flash flood triggered by heavy rainfall in Himachal Pradesh since Friday, officia… [+3743 chars]

articles.title: Vaishno Devi Yatra Temporarily Suspended Amid Heavy Rain
articles.description: The yatra to the Vaishno Devi shrine atop Trikuta hills in Reasi district of Jammu and Kashmir was temporarily suspended on Friday evening following flash floods triggered by heavy rain, officials said.

Several videos show a flood-like situation on the Vaishno Devi track.
